name: Copolia Heights: Flight of the Fruit Bats
description: Granite dome twilight. Bats surge from cave dividing into three braids then rejoin above red-lit shard. Seven chalk ticks at cave lip. Kassim climbs, scars silver. Riddle: When the night divides and joins, the sum becomes your road.
prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card, muted sepia + indigo + teal + faint gold highlights. Ritual haunting atmosphere, layered symbolic composition. Granite dome twilight. Bats surge from cave dividing into three braids then rejoin above red-lit shard. Seven chalk ticks at cave lip. Kassim climbs, scars silver.. Key props numeric: 3 braids, 7 ticks, 1 shard. Cipher letter: T Bearing: 220°. Intricate line engraving, subtle volumetric mist, painterly etched hybrid
